website_summaries.verdict: Nest’s collection of candles are beautiful whether or not they’ve been lit, and when they are, expect an evenly dispersed wave of gentle fragrance to envelop your space.
pros: Scent is a mix of hyacinth, forget-me-nots, and blue hydrangea floral tones
Many other varieties available, in different scents and color schemes
cons: Expensive, but proceeds go to the Autism Speaks charity

customer_reviews.title: Dicey Pricey but make the home smell Spicey
customer_reviews.text: Hardest time giving it a rating. Fantastic smelling candle and it last a good bit, but damn that price point. Like, I love me some good smelling candles but I also like eating something besides ramen noodles. NEST, good job and the candle, please lower prices So that this engineer doesn’t have to go dumpster diving for his next meal 😂
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Ugh; FIRE!
customer_reviews.text: Candle worked great at first; fragrance was excellent and very strong. Now about half way down the wicks would not stay lit and had to manually remove some of the wax to keep candle going; alright; not a big deal. Kind of expected more out of a candle this expensive; but ok. The real issue; the candle got to end and turned into a giant torch; entire wax was on fire; had to put out with salt. Very concerning; highlights the reason you should never leave a candle unattended I guess. Aftermath picture attached.
customer_reviews.author: zerobane

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Jesus
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells like Jesus's cologne. The aroma lasts for days and resembles Jean-Claude's masculine scent. I will soon buy second one for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great holiday fragrance but the jar shattered from the heat of the flame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, but is more of a holiday scent
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of this candle - I love amber and bergamot above most other fragrances. Opinions have been divided on this one, though - I've heard this is a very fall/winter scent, which I can agree with, but I've also had complaints of a pumpkin smell. I don't get any pumpkin, and if I did I wouldn't mind (I like the smell), but for someone who doesn't like pumpkin this is probably not the right candle. If you like amber and bergamot this is for you, though. I have a couple other Nest candles (Ocean Mist & Sicilian Tangerine) and this one is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: TOO HEAVILY FRAGRANCED AND NOT THE RIGHT ONE!
customer_reviews.text: If there was a "minus", I'd unfortunately have to give this just that. The scent does not smell at all like "ocean mist". It has way too much perfume and truly artificial smell that does not "smell" like ocean mist at all - heavily fragranced. I'm so glad I bought the smallest size to try it as this is quite expensive. Have tried other Nest scents and not been disappointed, so this is may be an anomaly, but I'll not try purchasing a Nest candle again. Very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quaility cheaply made and smells bad
customer_reviews.text: The candles generated a lot of black soot and set the smoke alarm off several times. Almost 1⁄2 of the candle burned in less than 4 hours. The website states 50-60 hours burn time. I am very disappointed. Do not buy this very expensive & pricey but cheaply made candle. Save your money and shop somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Long time shopper

customer_reviews.title: A very sexy candle!
customer_reviews.text: I was very apprehensive because it was only a two ounce candle pretty small but wow it’s mighty. I understand the price now. I’m going to say buying the 8oz version is going to be totally worth it because this candle lasts a while and you don’t need to leave it on for long and the smell will Permeate the entire area and it’s very strong. I would also say this is a great gift for anyone and especially for a masculine man.
customer_reviews.author: That one girl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Fresh Tree Scent!
customer_reviews.text: Best candles EVER! I have ordered many of these for myself and as gifts. The scents are amazing! This is my second year ordering the Birchwood Pine. My home smells like Christmas and fresh trees! I order two large and one single wick this year because I love to light them all the time. They lasted from Thanksgiving all the way to the 3rd of January. I get compliments every time someone walks in my home. I also keep the containers as vases as I entertain a lot and they look beautiful on my tables with fresh flowers in them.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Hot, smoky burn.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Nest candle. Before they cancelled it, I had the bourbon and oats scent and it was divine. This scent smell nice and crisp. The problem with the candle is that it burns too hot. No matter how short I clip the wicks, the flame extends an inch (too high) and gives out wisps of black smoke, which will eventually leave soot on the ceiling. I will use it outside, I guess. But an expensive lesson, nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Eliphas Levi

customer_reviews.title: Hearth, Holiday and Pumpkin Chai
customer_reviews.text: "Pumpkin Chai" - Must have for fall. This was my first Nest candle and got me hooked. This one smells like pumpkin and spices, so not much to describe here. "Holiday" - Definitely my favorite, and I plan on buying it every Christmas. Hard to describe the scent but is just too good and they nail the "holiday" scent in my opinion (whatever that is). "Hearth" - After unboxing I first thought the piney and frankincensey smell might be a bit too overwhelming, but we ended up enjoying this candle quite a bit. Not my all time favorite but a nice one to buy in the winter. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I originally smelled this candle at a fancy store and thought, "I need this, but I doubt my bank card will go through today." So, a month later, instead of paying back my student loans, I opted to buy the Tarragon candle and it was so worth it! If you have a kid crop dusting you in the kitchen, just light this baby and you will be free from any noxious odor that comes your way. Got a teenage daughter who decided deodorant is harmful for ozone, that's right, light the candle! It makes your entire house smell delightful and no one realizes I have a cat and lazy kids who are apparently allergic to showering. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: christi gorth

customer_reviews.title: RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: Nest has forever been "it" when it comes to scents. I see they're cheating out. Tragic. $42 for a small jar candle that arrived with wax higher on one side than the other (due to heat in transport I presume), but also the scent was barely discernible. We bought grapefruit. Almost no scent. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Newporter57Top Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Cult favorite candle...?
customer_reviews.text: I have been dying to try a Nest candle for a long long time. Purchased this one because it received great reviews and I typically enjoy the wood burning scent of a candle. Hearth is very perfumey and to me does not have the hint of hearthiness as it is described. That being said, it is a pleasant scent. Not one that I would purchase again, but pleasant enough. The biggest disappointment was the candle’s scent throw. To me, it was marginal at best. I could smell the candle in the direct vicinity of the candle only. Terribly pricey for what it is. If you’re on the fence about trying one of these candles, I would say take a pass.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewr in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Produced black/dark smoke
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a holiday candle and bought this Nest candle, as well as the Thymes Frasier Fir candle. Both candles had pleasant fragrances, but I preferred the Frasier Fir. The deciding factor, however, was that the Nest candle did not burn cleanly and released a black/dark smoke, whereas the Thymes candle burned very cleanly. I would not buy the Nest candle again.
customer_reviews.author: L'il Spitfire

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging. Overrated candle quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging. Overrated candle quality. I expected it to smell up my whole house but i had to get very close to smell it. . Disappointed considering the price. My guests all laughed when I told them how much I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: No scent
customer_reviews.text: Hearth was my favorite scent when I first tried it so I was excited to find it on Amazon. Looks like a real NEST candle but doesn’t smell like anything. I don’t know if it’s fake, or old, but there’s something wrong with it. The first few days I was like “does it actually have a scent?”, trying to convince myself that it did. Then I tested it in the bathroom (the smallest room you can imagine....), closed the door and left it there for almost 2 hours. Then opened the door: no difference. That’s when I knew for sure that it didn’t work. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mickael

customer_reviews.title: I love the Nest Candle line
customer_reviews.text: I love the Nest Candle line. They are slow burning so I feel I am getting my moneys worth. This particular smell I do not care for. It smells like a mix of grandma’s house and baby powder. The box was also damaged when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Poor value
customer_reviews.text: I received this candle in the small size, as gift, and loved it so much that I decided to buy the 3 wick. Mistake!! Scent is not as strong and actually smells burnt the lower it gets. Wicks kept going out and I had to pour some of the wax out to try and keep them lit so lost half the candle in the garbage. Don't waste your money on the big one as it is not enjoyable or worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: FlaLady

customer_reviews.title: Smells heavenly, pricey though
customer_reviews.text: Moroccan Amber smells so heavenly. I would buy this candle as a treat, The price is steep but it does smell better than your standard candle. Exotic, a little musky and light. I bought the oil also because I love the smell so much.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a smoldering campfire
customer_reviews.text: This candle is nice to look at, comes nicely wrapped, i don't know if i got one from a bad batch that didn't get all the ingredients put in it or what but this thing has that awful smell of when you put out a candle and it smokes for a little while, this candle smells like that the whole time It's burning. I was really hoping to get a Christmas festive scented candle to chear up the scenes, this is not it, zero pine or orange peel smell and not happy at all with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia miller

customer_reviews.title: NEST CANDLES ARE THE BEST EVER.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST CANDLE I HAVE EVER HAD. IT THROWS A GREAT SMELL FOR A SMALL CANDLE. THE SMELL WENT THRU MY HOLE HOUSE. NEST CANDLES SURE KNOW HOW TO PUT OUT THE AROMA. BURNED NICE AND CLEAN. I AM HOOKED ON MOROCCAN AMBER.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so well.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this candle and received it on the same day from Amazon. The candle is expensive and I’m hopeful it lasts a long time. Thus far we have burned it a few hours and it smells very good. Value will be determined on its consistency and longevity. Most candles aren’t worth this much $
customer_reviews.author: John Smaha

customer_reviews.title: Best candle ever. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful scent! I cannot say enough good things about this candle. It burns slow and steady, I've lit it now several nights in a row and it's barely a dent in the candle. I believe longevity will be good. Scent is wonderful, smells just like the Holidays and is not overpowering. Have received compliments from friends who've stopped by when I have it burning.
customer_reviews.author: N. George

customer_reviews.title: Smells like fragrant shower products
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 other NEST candles over the past few years and found all the other scents to be natural and pleasant. I have really enjoyed the others so I thought I would take a chance on a new flavor. The others had just enough scent to fill the room but never over powering. This was smells like a cheap body spray or fragrant shampoo and is really powerful. It might be a good bathroom candle, or to fill your house with the "I just took a shower" smell at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Candles
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Nest Candles for years now and was so disappointed when they discontinued the Blue Garden scent; however, when I found them on Amazon, I was thrilled! Unfortunately, these are FAKE! They do not come in the blue glass holder like they ALWAYS have and the fragrance doesn't exist. Anyone who knows Nest Candles knows the candle's fragrance is strong and fills the room. Not these. I've returned them for a refund. Beware and don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This scent epitomizes Christmas to me. I have this in the 3-wick and 2 classic ones. The smell is sweet, warming, but light at the same time. Their description of the scent is 100% accurate. I like it so much I light it even when it isn't Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Nest Candle Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these candles. They have the best scents. Scents last for a very long time. These are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice candle but didn't realize I was buying a small candle
customer_reviews.text: I love the candle --the glass container was stripe-frosted and beautiful --and beautifully packaged-it would make a very nice gift. But I was disappointed and it may be a mistake by Amazon rather than the product or the seller-but , I wanted a Nest candle --and when comparing prices , it wasn't clear that I was buying a very small candle. I was comparing the prices of Nest candles when I was shopping for a Nest candle--and assumed it was a larger size than it actually was. Kind of overpriced for what you get
customer_reviews.author: peaches

customer_reviews.title: Melty Candle
customer_reviews.text: There was no box with this item. The wax was melted. I also received another candle at the same time, so I assume it was originally sent melted.
customer_reviews.author: Book Club Val

customer_reviews.title: Nest Candles seem to be loosing Scent
customer_reviews.text: I have used and loved NEST candles for years and enjoyed them very much. I have found two changes in the last year or so. 1. the smaller sized candles have little to no fragrance, unless you are standing within 2 or 3 feet of the candle. and 2. even the larger and largest candles no longer fill my home with their lovely fragrances. I can still enjoy them within a room or two but no more than that.
customer_reviews.author: WayOutWest

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The worst of it is the fragrance is too floral for me (well, hello, it said "rose" in the description, ha). The quality? Amazing. I will definitely be ordering NEST, again. I just need to find the fragrance I prefer! I hate spending good money on a candle that doesn't put out smell. This candle can be lit for 3 minutes and boom, you can smell it. Again, just make sure you like the fragrance you're selecting! :)
customer_reviews.author: Korey Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, exotic scent.
customer_reviews.text: Calls to mind luxurious, lantern-lit desert tents, with their Berber rugs, and pillows stacked high. Even when the candle is unlit, a little scent wafts by.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Well let me say that I LOVE this scent BUT the first one ordered the wick ...
customer_reviews.text: Well let me say that I LOVE this scent BUT the first one ordered the wick was so short it wouldn't burn longer than a few seconds. The second replacement was COMPLETELY melted in the box. Like every drop of the wax was inside the box and not in the jar. I know it's hot outside but dang........what gives?!
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: The holy grail of candles
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle!! Got the smallest votive because I wanted to see how this compared to the Slatkin bamboo candle, and it is a perfect match! Very happy that I found this scent and this small candle has a great throw, burns evenly and seems like it will last awhile! Will definitely repurchase and I am excited to try other scents.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Scent
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Nest Candles. They are totally worth the price. It's a great gift, one of those things I probably wouldn't buy myself but love to receive and love to give. Japanese Black Current is a nice clean scent, not over whelming but definitely makes your whole house smell great. As always, Amazon Prime is the best!!! I ordered it very late in the season to give to one of those "what do you give to the person who has everything" kind of friends. It arrived within 48 hours of ordering in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spicy old man cologne
customer_reviews.text: The candle arrived melted, but the scent was more of an issue. I bought the Moroccan amber and it reminds me of a spicy old man cologne with undertones of incense. I would get this candle if I wanted my house to smell like an old gothic church, def not a “sexy Jesus” vibe. The candle was melted when it arrived and got on my hand and for the love of God I could not get that smell off so A+ for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: CLR

customer_reviews.title: Calming Scent
customer_reviews.text: Heaven on Earth.... by far, the best candle I have ever smelled. I do not like floral scents. This is a musky/amber more masculine scent. If you like fruit or flower scented candles, then this may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scent for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scent for two Christmases in a row. It's beautiful! It's light, it's fresh and it just screams it's Christmas time! I was so happy to find something nice to fill the house with a scent of Christmas since we have a fake tree, but not something that smelled like fake pine. This isn't trying to copy anything like pine, or cinnamon, or apple spice scent, it's it's own fresh, light, lovely scent. It doesn't smell fake and chemical-ish at all. The candle lasts for many hours. I burned it daily for about a month and it was almost gone by the end. I'd highly recommend trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous scent! Quality Candle
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of a pumpkin spice candle in the fall, and this candle from Nest nicely fits the bill. I purchased the 3 wick candle. The wax burns as a whole - so you don't get the burned out tunnel - which may be why it costs a bit more than other candles. The scent is also fantastic! The quality of the wax and scents makes this my favorite brand of candle.
customer_reviews.author: Another View

customer_reviews.title: Super strong candle
customer_reviews.text: Like all Nest candles, this is very strongly scented. Only takes 15-30 minutes of burn time to scent my entire home. Seriously the best scented candles on the market. I have found only the Henri Bendel candles to be as strong and similarly priced. However, I am not crazy about this particular scent. Very strong white floral that tends to become a bit cloying. Entirely personal preference. It smells beautiful but due to the strength of Nest candles, it's a bit overkill for me.
customer_reviews.author: M Renee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! NEXT TO NO SMELL:(
customer_reviews.text: I have NO IDEA how anyone could smell this candle! This was a $16 candle! It is the size of a small votive candle no less. I have NEVER been so disappointed in a candle! Go to Walmart and buy their $.94 candle which is 3 times the size and a LOT more smell, not to mention bang for your buck. Do not buy this candle:( You will be so disappointed. I cannot believe I spent $16 on a votive candle. Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice, shame on me:)
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing holiday fragrance that will make you happy!
customer_reviews.text: HANDS DOWN the best holiday scent I have ever found!! I purchase several of these candles in an assortment of sizes to use throughout my home as well as give them as gifts. The packaging is beautiful and the glass container is timeless and looks great in any setting. You will not be disappointed in this amazing flavor and it’s intensity!
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIN MCPHERSON

customer_reviews.title: Nest Bamboo Candle
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly beautiful scent. The small votive burns for several hours. The fragrance fills a 1200 square fov
customer_reviews.author: Me 2

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order this candle in the summer
customer_reviews.text: This very expensive candle was very poorly packaged. The result was a box lined with melted wax, wicks that needed to be dug out, and one wick that won’t light. I assume part of the problem may have been due to warm temperatures, but I have ordered other candles in the summer with absolutely no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly R

customer_reviews.title: My favorite candle
customer_reviews.text: I got this candle as a Christmas gift from a client one year and it quickly became my favorite candle. When it came time to replace it and I saw the price I almost spit out my drink, but the price is worth it. It lasts forever and burning it just 10 minutes fills the room with the scent. It's such a beautiful amber scent and I recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Eff

customer_reviews.title: Nest candles are great, used candles in a Nest box aren’!
customer_reviews.text: I love Nest candles. This is my 5th one to buy. I have bought 2 from Amazon warehouse. The first one was great, the second one I received an old, used, nasty smelling candle. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Uneven wax at the top
customer_reviews.text: I’ve am an avid Nest candle user and lover. I’ve always ordered directly from their site, but this time I used Amazon because of the free shipping. The candle arrived, and the wax was so uneven-about 1 inch higher on one side. It looked completely lopsided. When I pay $40 for a CANDLE, I expect it to be perfect. It was immediately returned. I will never buy a nest candle of Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: christina orem

customer_reviews.title: Completely shattered - such a shame
customer_reviews.text: The product came shattered. Glass shards spilled from the box as I opened it and I had to throw it all away so the nosey cat wouldn’t climb in and get hurt. I snapped a couple of pictures. So disappointed as the candle would have been stunning. Even broken I can tell it smelled lovely. But the product arrived in such a state as to pose a danger if touched.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Not the original sent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy the Holiday sent all year round but more during the holidays for hostess gifts and presents. This year the box said Holiday but it didn't smell the same. The box was different too. Since it is the same price at Nordstrom's I'll be going back there for future purchasing of this scent!
customer_reviews.author: Scb

customer_reviews.title: Best candles ever
customer_reviews.text: Can hardly afford these candles but they'reworth every penny! These smell good when they aren't even lit.I also love the grapefruit scent. When the wick won't burn anymore I put the candle wax in my wax warmer, and wash the glass the candle was in. I put cheaper candles that don't smell as good in the glass that way I feel sort of chic. "Yes there was once a Nest candle in there"
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is nice and fresh but for the price, it really doesn’t last long at all. Also super disappointed in the fact that the flame gets super high, so you have to trim the wick everyte before you light it or you’ll have a small bonfire happening! I feel like I trew my money down the toilet on this candle. SO not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: ViperDriver

customer_reviews.title: Spicy, slightly sweet, clean scent.
customer_reviews.text: I love this grapefruit scent for my kitchen/dining area. I've had the candle before, and chose to get both a large candle and the diffuser. My downstairs is pretty much an open floor plan, so using more than a single scent would make for a 'muddy' experience. The candle is strong enough to fill the kitchen and a nearby 600 sq ft room--and then waft up the staircase...adding the diffuser should make the 'living room' area filled with the same scent. he grapefruit is very fresh--a spring/summery scent...and Nest candles/diffusers are really great--I'm going to have to find them in a retail setting so I can check out their other scents.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly seasonal scent
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those candles that you almost don't even need to light--the scent is heavenly and just screams Christmas. I did notice that as it burned down, the scent was considerably less intense, which was a little disappointing. It did burn for many hours and fairly cleanly. A good high end seasonal candle.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedyE30M3

customer_reviews.title: Good scent, poor "throw"
customer_reviews.text: Smells good (I'd describe it as sort of woodsy, piney, cologne-like, pleasant). BUT, very let down with the "throw" of this candle. Other Nest candles I've owned that were 1/4 of the size had better throw than this; can't smell it unless on top of it. Makes me afraid to spend $40 on a nest candle again.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Usually the Best..... I purchase all the time
customer_reviews.text: Always love these candles, but the most recent one I purchased hardly smells and the wick seems to be burning faster than the candle is melting? Not sure about what has happened. Typically awesome candles, tho. I will order again for another try. Maybe I just got a bad one from a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: mdgflower

customer_reviews.title: Only So-So for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I love candles, and I light them every night. I have 3 large rooms (Kitchen, Den & Master Bedroom), and I wanted candles with a stronger scent to fill (but not overwhelm) those areas. I LOVED the fragrances themselves, but the results were only so-so. The Grapefruit scent was the most pleasant, and the most effective. I have about the same results with the candles from Bath & Body Works- depending on the scent. And these candles aren't cheap. So for the money, I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: SB4353

customer_reviews.title: Very intense floral
customer_reviews.text: This candle has a nice floral scent, but is very intense. For those who like the aroma of a floral candle to immediately spread throughout an entire floor of their house upon lighting, this is the candle for you. The intense floral scent is a little too much for me. Other than that, the packaging and quality are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It's a really small "votive" candle
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I should have seen the actual weight - but the product image makes it look like a great deal on a full size room candle... this is rather a small thing. Think egg cup, not coffee mug. You'll need three in a big room.. so not a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: David O. Shantz

customer_reviews.title: Love the Aroma that Lingers
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the price is high for these small candles; but, the fragrance is amazing. I use it for special bedroom events.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: Best brand of candles ever, been using for years.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Nest candles, I’ve tried many brands and this is hands down the best, doesn’t smell like smoke or burning, the scent lingers long after candle is turned off. Bamboo candle is actually floral, I normally don’t like floral, but this is clean and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as last year
customer_reviews.text: The scent is still wonderful, but this year you could not smell the candle throughout the house like before. Something changed and not for the better.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Native

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: The scent is amazing but at the end of the day, not sure this tiny 2oz candle is worth the $16 price tag. While the packaging and candle itself is gorgeous, I expected the scent to carry more and the candle to burn longer.
customer_reviews.author: NLRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Below expectations considering the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle based on the numerous five-star reviews, however, it did not live up to expectations. For the price, I expected a candle that would fill the room with subtle fragrance, but I found it provided no more scent than candles that cost far less. I was not wanting an overpowering fragrance, but I did want the room to have a warm fall scent. I also bought the Birchwood Pine scented candle and lit it to see if it too would be a letdown - whether it was worth the money remains to be seen, but the room did smell like Christmas, so I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: LJLW

customer_reviews.title: Dissipates so soon, too pricey
customer_reviews.text: I agree with reviewers who said the smell dissipates too soon. You can’t smell it unless you’re right over it when it’s lit. Nice fresh slightly woodsy bamboo smell, but too subtle. I knew it would be small. It would take a lot of these to smell good when lit in an area. Too pricey for not a lot of scent.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass and melted soy can't be shipped - out my money
customer_reviews.text: I have included pictures of how this product arrived to me. Good product it smelled wonderful. But as you can see it was not usable or shippable. Be careful ordering glass or items that may melt. I am out my money - use caution.
customer_reviews.author: Louise B.

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL (Misleading image)
customer_reviews.text: The candle is the size of a shot glass. I didn't realize this from the images that make it appear larger. Do not make the mistake that I made. You are paying $16 for a candle that might last a few days if you are lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Black smoke
customer_reviews.text: Nest Bamboo candle has been a staple at my house for years. I purchase them as needed locally. This is the 2nd candle purchased from Amazon - both candles produced black smoke. I know the tricks to avoid that and how to start a candle. I’m wondering if these 2 candles didn’t come from Nest.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Collins

customer_reviews.title: Came melted and unusable :(
customer_reviews.text: Smells absolutely amazing (got the sugar cookie). I did not realize it was so tiny! came melted and unusable. returning but am definitely looking into getting the larger size to see if that does not come damaged. The smell is too good not to try... the price is definitely high!
customer_reviews.author: katreen s lajeen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Scent
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this candle for housewarming gifts, Christmas gifts and for myself. I discovered it by walking into a design showroom and was immediately in love with the smell. When I asked what it was, it was this candle, this scent. I love the NEST products but to me, this is the best one by far.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Glass & Melted Candle Do Not Make for a Good Review!
customer_reviews.text: Box full of broken glass and a partially melted candle. it was packed in a regular NEST box, than a larger one. From the looks of it, it had been sitting in storage for awhile. Guess I'll order from NEST instead.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Proper storage and transport  at appropriate temperature.
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is fine. This is a wax candle.. should be stored in cooler temperatures in the warehouse and during transport. It arrived as a pair of bottles with a liquid mess all over. The carrier also had the bottles upside down in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dr V

customer_reviews.title: Love this fragrance; however, it was damaged when I received it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent but it came damaged when I received it. One wick was buried due to part of it melted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor candle pour
customer_reviews.text: I had to dig the wick out of the candle because it had been poured lopsided. I think I was sent a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: regantrainer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The carton was full of dust, taped closed with packing tape, and the edges are all torn and raggedy. At $65 per candle I don’t expect to have to apologize to my niece for the packaging. The candle itself is fine but I am disappointed in the quality of a Nest candle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: The candle itself smells good and when it’s burning it smells good. But it’s not as strong as what I would prefer especially for the price it is a little pricey and I think overpriced as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Kale

customer_reviews.title: NEST
customer_reviews.text: This pumpkin chai scented candle from NEST is a little sweeter and stronger than I was hoping. I have several NEST grapefruit scented candles that I love, wish I loved this one too. It's ok and the orange votive holder is pretty for fall. I ordered this online before actually smelling the scent in person.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: The candle is good quality but I prefer Mediterranean Fig scent. That's why 3 stars. This is my personal taste. Again, the candle is great quality. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Patrizia Pa

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Relaxing, Comforting -- Yet Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Moroccan Amber is my home's signature scent. Warm, elegant and sophisticated Moroccan Amber imparts an air of comfort and ease, while at the same time keeping the ambiance fresh and clean. My family and guests love it -- they always remark about how comfortable and secure our home feels. Moroccan Amber seems to make everyone feel welcome and to relax -- especially me!
customer_reviews.author: Charleigh

customer_reviews.title: i loved the tasteful glass container
customer_reviews.text: i loved the tasteful glass container, slow burn and potency of this candle.. only regret was having to wait on reorder for this particular "Holiday" fragrance that I understand is only offered seasonally. A friend gave me this candle as a gift four years ago and i make certain it is part of my holiday decor each year since. Love to give as hostess gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gray

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is a bit difficult to spend $40 on a candle. It is worth it! Within a minute of lightning it, the scent fills the room. It doesn't need to be lit as long as lower quality candles, and you can smell it even when it's not lit. Highly recommend m
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fair

customer_reviews.title: Favorite candle
customer_reviews.text: Nest candles are my new faves. I have always had problems with the perfumes of most candles, which give me severe headaches and sneezing fits. These candles do not do that. This is my favorite scent. It's not too heavy and doesn't smell artificial. I ordered three more in case Nest doesn't carry them next fall! They also last forever! I didn't even make it halfway through the first candle.
customer_reviews.author: L.P.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t burn well
customer_reviews.text: This candle burns terrible! I have to keep scraping the wax or the wick drowns. Not happy. I have many Harry Slatkin three wick candles that burn perfectly. Harry is married to the person that manufactures Nest. Will not Invest in a Nest Candle again.
customer_reviews.author: Island girl

customer_reviews.title: Can't get enough of this one!
customer_reviews.text: If you're a fan of simple woodsy wintry pine forest scents, you'll love this. I ended up buying the Classic candle size after using up this one. And a great perk with Nest candles is you can reuse their pretty glass holders - I use this one for my perfume samples!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Mrs. Meyers Iowa Pine Candle
customer_reviews.text: Bottom Line: A fantastic holiday candle that smells great, burns clean, and most importantly makes you feel that winter is here. I purchased this candle to replace last year's Mrs. Meyers Iowa Pine candle. ($12 w/ shipping for 25 hour burn time last I checked). I would say that the NEST Birchwood Pine is less sweet smelling than the Iowa Pine, which is good in my opinion. Overall, while it is a bit expensive, if you're looking for a candle that will remind you of winter and last all season, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: WI_Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Smells great.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the right scent for this time of year. There are some of your classic holiday notes, sure but this isn't just a mess of pine. There are floral notes that stand out in a good way. The motives also last an incredibly long time. Like, 3 overnight burns.
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: Melted candle anyone
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing of the product I received the boxes are brown inside to me as if they are old or was sitting in hot truck for days !
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Glass cracked at end and leaked wax everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This candle smelled great. It's pricey. It also cracked at the end and left my new placement and tablecloth full of wax.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S. Bishard

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love adore the smell. The candles i received lately are kind of oily soft. Sometimes they spark so be careful
customer_reviews.author: Cali girl

customer_reviews.title: smells like heaven and last long
customer_reviews.text: If you like a light fresh flowery scent then the bamboo candle is the one for you, I absolutely love Nest candles, they make my home smell like heaven and last long.
customer_reviews.author: Dacil

customer_reviews.title: Christmas all year long.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend got this as a gift from his yoga instructor and we burned it on Christmas eve and day along with many other holiday get togethers. The smell will fill your whole home, just like the rest of the best fragrance collection. I'm a huge fan of them all. This one candle in particular is so luxurious. You can't out a pricetag on the ambiance you will achieve.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: All time Favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this smell! Last long and really reaches all throughout your home. Perfect scent to turn on during guest arrival or just if you want to have a fresh smell in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Swanson

customer_reviews.title: no more
customer_reviews.text: i purchased orange blossom, grapefruit and bamboo along with this holiday, i love first three, but this holiday is disappointing. if you like fresh scent, this is not ur thing. This scent almost made me throw up however returning is like half the price, guess i will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: ZZ

customer_reviews.title: A BIG Difference
customer_reviews.text: These are the best candles! Definitely a difference from the ones you buy at the mall! We have bought many candles over the years, so far, these have the greatest fragrance and last so much longer!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick P.

customer_reviews.title: overpriced
customer_reviews.text: with all due respect, its a over priced vanilla scented candle, you can buy the same candle for a third of the price elsewhere, nothing special about the scent , don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: vicki stevens

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly good, however, there is no evident throw as it claims it should produce. my verdict is: if you have a smaller area to fill with a scent, this candle will do the trick. I have an open area without doors and this candle unfortunately smiles only when you approach it closer. A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.author: ElenorY

customer_reviews.title: Incredible scent throw
customer_reviews.text: Nest fragrances have this incredible scent throw. Even the little votives create so much smell that you can clearly smell it all over the open areas of my home (4000 sq ft). Grapefruit is my favorite scent. Clean and fruity.
customer_reviews.author: HulaChic6

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful small, Rose & wood
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic candle. They are three weeks and the wax is soy so it lasts long. Expensive but wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful and festive
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful and festive. I have NEVER spent even close to this amount of money on a candle. I decided to really splurge and treat myself to some good holiday smells this year. I am super happy with the fact that it does not smoke or turn the inside of the glass black with soot. My one and only peeve is I feel it should be bigger for the cost but i knew the size of the candle when i purchased it so it was no surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rader

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I found this a great gift for those who enjoy the scent of a fireplace. Nice looking container with reuse potential. Smells great whether lit or not.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Moser Miller

product_meta.title: NEST Fragrances NEST01BG003 Classic Candle- Blue Garden , 8.1 oz
product_meta.description: Color:Blue Garden| Size:ClassicThe blue garden candle by nest fragrances includes notes of blue hydrangea, hyacinth and forget-me-nots that are blended with fresh green notes and a dew drop accord to create the aroma of a lush floral garden. A portion of the proceeds from the sale of this candle will be donated to autism speaks. The scent is housed in a blue glass and blue box. The nest fragrances everyday collection combines color, texture and fragrance to enhance the everyday living and entertaining experience. The glass vases are designed to compliment the beauty of its surroundings; the classic shape and modern stripe etching will complement any décor. Each of the fragrances has been created by the most accomplished perfumers at the world's leading fragrance houses.
feature_bullets: NEST Fragrances Blue Garden Classic Candle, blue hydrangea, hyacinth and forget-me-nots are blended with fresh green notes and a dew drop accord to create the aroma of a lush floral garden.
Housed in blue translucent glass, a portion of the proceeds from the sale of this candle will be donated to Autism Speaks.
NEST Fragrances candles are made with a premium, soft, highly refined, cosmetic-grade wax to optimize burn and fragrance diffusion.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,467 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
